website_summaries.verdict: This is a complete non-electronic system that needs outdoor sunlight to flourish.
pros: Designed for the outdoor gardener who is looking for a non-electric system
Easy-to-follow instructions provide the perfect amount of water and nutrients
cons: Must have access to outdoor sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Charged full price for a repaired item.
customer_reviews.text: I got it all set up with minimal effort. Not sure the ph testers are still good, or that I understood how much nutrients (fertilizer) to put in. I would suggest using two bricks of the growing medium. Also, The top does not "snap" on like the directions day, so I used small clamps. Also, after it was set up I noticed that someone repaired a defect (a hole) with epoxy. It will too much of a hassel to send this back for a new one. I think it's pretty crappy that I got charged full price for a repaired item.
customer_reviews.author: V. Boliew

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful for success next time
customer_reviews.text: The concept is wonderful. I’m sure operator error contributed to some of my failure. Some plants did well but all developed mold on top and I believe the amount of moisture that escaped into the air contributed to mold on other potted plants in my house. I’ll try again outside when weather improves I used a grow light and placed by glass slider
customer_reviews.author: Susan Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great for hydroponics
customer_reviews.text: This is working out great for my larger aero garden plants. But, I did not like the coco noir supplied with it. After hydrating it leaves a dirty stain on roots. I bought some already hydrated, dry and loose, strand like coco filler and it worked great. You do have to keep top of plant a bit above water level so top of root gets air. I got the hang of it quickly
customer_reviews.author: clf

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Great for starting seedlings and keeping them safe ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Works great. Great for starting seedlings and keeping them safe from the elements. Good safe alternative to growing outside.
customer_reviews.author: lonedemon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is not made for hydrogenic growing don’t waste your money could not get company to answer questions. Just gave me answers for their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Carruc

customer_reviews.title: JUST WASTED $70.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE NONELECTRIC HYDROPONIC BOX. 1. It came with part missing 2. The drain holes in the reservoir drain the water BELOW the net pots. So plant will never touch the hydroponic solution. IMPOSSIBLE to grow plants. NO NOT BUY. JUST WASTED $70.
customer_reviews.author: snoopy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item as a Christmas gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a Christmas gift for my Brother in law who has everything. He loves to start his garden in the winter by growing seeds in his house starting in February. We also bought the lamp as well. He has told me many times how it does not take up much space in his dining room. I think he will be investing in more on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I will probably order another one. It has been one week since I planted vegetables in it, and they are already growing. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hydroponic grow kit doesn't hold water
customer_reviews.text: I intended to begin a hydroponic grow for our salad lettuce. First one I received looked just fine, clear instructions say to fill with water to the top of the curved section on wall. In trying to fill this I saw water on the floor, thought it had splashed. realized that it was leaking. Went through the hassle of returning that one, to receive a new one with the EXACT SAME PROBLEM. I am going to find a better hydro starter kit. Very disappointed and feeling that I have wasted a lot of time and energy. Meanwhile my starter seedlings are dying as I don't have a medium prepared for them to go into.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn't latch well, media not good
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cover doesn't fit the container, it's skewed a bit (not flat), ergo tilting (most likely manufacturing defect). There were holes also in the plastic bag containing the medium, hence it was all over the plastic container when opened. The media also does not expand much. I've soaked it whole night plus whole day and still not absorbing much or expanding, had to really weigh the blocks down and hopefully that will solve the problem. Just hassle to return as it's a gigantum box. Maybe if I'll order another one and see if they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Outdoors Only.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for indoor hydroponics however I soon learned the design is not best for indoors. The net pot openings are huge (6") and the growing medium, coconut coir, retains so much moisture that mold grew before the seedlings emerged. Had to dump all my seedling babies. Unless you have a well stabilized environment, I do not suggest this for indoor growing. The instructions were very vague and ambiguous. Good luck deciphering. I'll try this unit again, this time outdoors in the summer of 2019. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Log

customer_reviews.title: It Leaked!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I filled it with water for the first time and it leaked at the end. I looked at the area that leaked an it was very thin. Not well made.
customer_reviews.author: M and M

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is too weak.
customer_reviews.text: It broke as I was putting in the mixture. The plastic is too weak. Particularly weak at the areas near the wheel insertions.
customer_reviews.author: Mayte

customer_reviews.title: Novice beware.
customer_reviews.text: Not a great starter kit for a novice. It was an epic fail. It really needed more detailed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terribly packed, everything mixed up on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Terribly packed, everything mixed up on arrival, total mess. In order to start growing anything, I have to separate and clean all the parts first. But I feel so discouraged that the box seats idle in my garage...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: didnt grow anything
customer_reviews.text: worst and waste of money, i tried a lot of greens but no results
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the 5 mesh pots ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the 5 mesh pots ... who do i contact ?
customer_reviews.author: Larry Michael Rowe

product_meta.title: Emsco Group 2370 Hydropickers Compact 24” x 20” Footprint – Mobility Provided by Casters Non-Electric Hydroponics Grow Box, Blue
product_meta.description:
Enjoy hydroponic gardening with EMSCO Group’s Hydropicker Non-Electric Hydroponic Grow Box!

The Hydropicker makes it easy for the average consumer to begin hydroponic gardening without investing hundreds of dollars in expensive equipment. By giving the user exactly what they need to begin hydroponic gardening and eliminating the need for electricity, the Hydropicker creates the ultimate kit to start enjoying hydroponics in any setting!

Hydroponics accelerates growth due to not using soil. Growth nutrients are added to water, which is directly and evenly dispersed to plant roots and accelerates the growing process. The Hydropicker suspends plant roots directly in growth nutrients to take full advantage of fast hydroponic growth.

The Hydropicker is a non-electric hydroponic unit that has a closed top to shield the water in its reservoir from sunlight. By shielding the water from sunlight, the potential for mold and mildew growth is negated, which eliminates the need for an electric pump to oxygenate water!

Since the Hydropicker does not require electricity, it does not need to be placed close to an electrical source. The Hydropicker has a compact design of 24” x 20” that can easily be placed anywhere such as a patio, veranda, or even a fire escape! The unit features 4 casters to provide mobility in any setting.

The Hydropicker features all necessary components for a hydroponic growth system. Coconut coir growth media, growth nutrients, and a Ph testing kit are included with each unit. Easy to understand instructions are provided to get a complete hydroponic novice growing in no time!
feature_bullets: GREAT INTRODUCTION TO HYDROPONICS – The Hydropicker makes it easy for the average consumer to begin hydroponic gardening without investing hundreds of dollars in expensive equipment. By giving the user exactly what they need to begin hydroponic gardening and eliminating the need for electricity, the Hydropicker creates the ultimate kit to start enjoying hydroponics in any setting!

INCREASED HYDROPONIC YIELDS – Hydroponics accelerates growth due to not using soil. Growth nutrients are added to water, which is directly and evenly dispersed to plant roots and accelerates the growing process. The Hydropicker suspends plant roots directly in growth nutrients to take full advantage of fast hydroponic growth

NON-ELECTRIC HYDROPONIC SYSTEM – The Hydropicker is a non-electric hydroponic unit that has a closed top to shield the water in its reservoir from sunlight. By shielding the water from sunlight, the potential for mold and mildew growth is negated, which eliminates the need to oxygenate water with an electric pump.

COMPACT & MOBILE UNIT – Since the Hydropicker does not require electricity, it does not need to be placed close to an electrical source – now you can utilize hydroponics in untraditional settings! The Hydropicker has a compact design of 24” x 20” that can easily be placed anywhere, such as a patio, veranda, or even a fire escape! The unit features 4 casters to provide mobility in any setting.

EASY ASSEMBLY AND HYDROPONIC INSTRUCTIONS – The Hydropicker features all the necessary components for a hydroponic growth system. Coconut coir growth media, growth nutrients, and a Ph testing kit are included with each unit. Easy to understand instructions are provided to get a complete hydroponic novice growing in no time!
